Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled benefits. Considering its unique features and quality, we believe it's worth more than $8000 to you. For this opportunity, I am offering you the chance to own it at an exclusive price of $12000. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
